recipes.name: TABULEE SALAD
ingredients: 1 tablespoon finely chopped mint or 1/4 teaspoon dry mint
instructions: Combine 2 cups boiling water and 1 cup bulgur wheat.
Let it stand until all water is absorbed, about 1 hour.
Combine in salad bowl with remaining ingredients.
Toss until dressing is well distributed.

recipes.name: BULGOR-CARROT-PINEAPPLE-SALAD
instructions: Chill and add remaining ingredients, mix well, chill.

recipes.name: COLE SLAW
instructions: Put 1/2 cup bulgur wheat in one cup of water, bring to boil, cover, reduce heat and simmer until water is absorbed, chill.
Blend all ingredients, serve in lettuce cups and garnish with tomato wedges.

recipes.name: BULGOR-CARROT-RAISIN-SALAD
recipes.description: Substitute 2 tablespoons french dressing for the pineapple juice and 1/4 cup raisins for the crushed pineapple in above recipe.

recipes.name: CHEF'S BULGOR SALAD
ingredients: 1/2 cup olive oil or salad oil
instructions: Mix bulgur wheat, french dressing, pickle, salt and pepper.
Add green pepper, sliced celery and onion.
Mix well, serve on a bed of salad greens which have been tossed with french dressing.
Top with thin strips of cold boiled ham or tongue, cold chicken or turkey, and Canadian or Swiss cheese.

recipes.name: BULGOR DUTCH CUCUMBER SALAD
ingredients: 1 tablespoon tarragon vinegar or lemon juice
instructions: Combine in salad bowl with bulgur mixture.
Toss with the bulgur mixture and top with 4 slices of paprika.

recipes.name: SALAD
instructions: Serve on a bed of lettuce and garnish with tomato wedges.
For a hearty main course salad, add 1 can of tuna fish or some diced cooked meat or poultry.
